attributes.action: Upgrade the A14 between Spittals and M11 motorway
attributes.additional_details: For years the A14 was being looked at for upgrading until the Government made budget cuts.  This now needs to be looked at again, as everyday there is an accident or incident which blocks it up and all surrounding areas, causing traffic problems for Cambridgeshire. The Government needs to upgrade the A14 as its a major trunk road round Cambridgeshire
